title: BRIEF-China's Bringspring Sci and Tech to acquire stake in tech company
text:
BRIEF-China's Bringspring Sci and Tech to acquire stake in tech company Sept 24 
Sept 24 Bringspring Science And Technology Co Ltd 
* Says plans to purchase 51 percent in Shanghai tech company for 127.5 million yuan ($19.98 million) 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1KSUc3N 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3818 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
